mapper.select: SELECT e.empno, e.id, e.pw, e.name, e.birth, e.phone, e.add1, e.add2, e.add3, e.joinday, e.leaveday, e.picture, e.intro, e.deleted, e.posno, e.authno, e.depno, a.authno, a.authname FROM EMPLOYEE e, AUTH a where a.authno = e.authno and e.id = #{id} and e.pw = #{pw} and deleted ='N'
mapper.update: UPDATE EMPLOYEE SET phone = #{ phone }, birth = #{ birth }, add1 = #{ add1 }, add2 = #{ add2 }, add3 = #{ add3 }, intro = #{ intro } where id = #{ id }
